channel.title: Ub3rX
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6641/ub3rx.png[/img]
[b]My Team;[/b] *[i][b]Three One Seven[/b][/i] ([b]Myself[/b]) *[i]Jeremy (He still hasn't told me his moparscape forum username) [b]He is going to help with myself with small server edits.[/b][/i]
[b]Information;[/b] [i]I'm going to go with my side project [u]as it was[/u] and try to make this a F2P server. Most servers out there are just pickups and last a month before shutting down. I'm making a regular server, every single area F2P and every single item F2P. I will add custom things, like minigames but they will be in F2P grounds.[/center]
[size=14pt]Minigame & Mini-quest development[/size]
[ul][li]Elvarg[/li][/ul]

item.title: Ub3rX
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

It works with iClarity’s client. But i’ve scrapped this project (except for the magic idea) and am now working on a F2P server that will be full of content.

I hope it turns out ok.

Read full topic

item.title: Ub3rX
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Dude what you used to make the multi sign appear? I have made this code but it doesn’t make the mutli icon pop up, it uses the range icon:

[code] public void frame61(int i1) {

outStream.createFrame(61);

outStream.writeByte(i1);
updateRequired = true;

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}[/code]

And it uses the code:
frame61(1); // on
frame61(-1); // off
Can you help? Msn: mafkeesmaf@live.nl

Read full topic

item.title: Ub3rX
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

At the moment I’m simply ripping the lunar interface and changing text/icons around.

I will end up using the same icons as regular/ancient magics; So I don’t have to make a separate folder for ‘sprites’.

item.title: Ub3rX
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

[quote=“Impurity, post:2, topic:328461”]Honestly, you got a really really great idea here. I hope this actually works out. If you need any help, I would be more then happy to help you with some stuff. I don’t use MSN though, I use steam because I am usually playing team fortress. But, if you need it, I can help. I’ve been coding pservers for about 3 years now and have a very high knowledge of them. I’ve been studying Java for about 5 years now and know a lot about it. I hope you have fun doing this and I hope you have success. good luck mate.

P.S. If you want my steam name, just pm me and I’ll add you. I also have skype, but I don’t use it much.[/quote]

Thank you very much for the offer; I’ll keep you in mind if I need something that I can handle alone.

@Stupid : I already own a domain + forums. Thanks anyways.

Also;

If a administrator could let me post a link to my development forums that would be cool.

Read full topic

item.title: Ub3rX
item.dc:creator: @Impurity Impurity
item.description:
@Impurity wrote:

Honestly, you got a really really great idea here. I hope this actually works out. If you need any help, I would be more then happy to help you with some stuff. I don’t use MSN though, I use steam because I am usually playing team fortress. But, if you need it, I can help. I’ve been coding pservers for about 3 years now and have a very high knowledge of them. I’ve been studying Java for about 5 years now and know a lot about it. I hope you have fun doing this and I hope you have success. good luck mate.

P.S. If you want my steam name, just pm me and I’ll add you. I also have skype, but I don’t use it much.

Read full topic
